_header: Katherine the courteous of all that I know
Subjects: Katherine of Sinai, saint; hymns, to saints
_description: Richard Spaldyng, A hymn to St. Katharine of Sinai — twenty 14-line stanzas (with acrostics)

BodRo22.First Lines:
Kateryne þe curteys of all þat I knowcumlyest kepyng
                    kaytifs ffro kare…
BodRo22.Last Lines:
…Qwer aungeles schul syng vsWith joye & with
                    blysse
BodRo22.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Die Katherinenhymne des Ricardus Spaldyng.” 
             Angli
         30 (1907): 523-48: 539-47.
Holthausen,  Ferdinand. 
             “Ein mittelenglischer Katharinenhymnus von Richard Spalding.” 
             Anglia
         60 (1936): 150-64: 152-61.
